Timber Splinter deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Impetuous {R} [i](If this card is put into exile from anywhere other than the stack, you may cast it for its impetuous cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
flavor_text: [i]Delia figured there was no better way to disable an unfamiliar enemy than a good old bonk on the noggin.[/i]
